name: The Obama Chronicles
description:
This is an extremely short VN game, consisting of obama, joe and steve. it has 2 different endings. This game will probably not take more than 5 minutes of your time. 
I came up with this in my bed, insomnia-induced brain cells and sheer stupidity.

I may, or may not make a part 2 to this.

This is strictly non-profit, I also do not claim any images used in creation of this game.
